alert.note: Alert for Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued November 20 at 7:02PM EST until November 21 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Key West
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT... ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Saltwater flooding. * WHERE...Upper Florida Keys. * WHEN...Through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Saltwater flooding of low elevation streets and lots is expected. Some storm drains will overflow, and some seawalls and docks will be overtopped. Boaters can expect less clearance under fixed bridges. Motorists should remember that persistent puddles around the times of high tide are almost certain to contain a mix of saltwater.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property including the lowest elevations of ground story buildings.
